name: Alpine Crawler Wild
summary: Alpine Crawler Wild is an Off Road simulation with real-time physics. Featuring 3 game modes (Free Ride, Time Trial, Challenge), 9 cars/trucks, 3 terrains/locations, and 30 exciting and hard levels (10 per country). Plus different weather and day-night conditions (day, night, dawn, rain) as well as visual effects (car-lights, car-colours, dirt). Alpine Crawler Wild has 5 playable drivers (both male and female).
